name: SKRequest
desc: An abstract class that represents a request to the App Store.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Sends the request to the Apple App Store.

items.name: var delegate: SKRequestDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the request object.

items.name: protocol SKRequestDelegate
items.desc: Common methods that are implemented by delegates for any subclass of the SKRequest abstract class.
